title: Is Partiful the Least Cringe Option to Get People to Your Event?
description: Partiful wants to be the go-to option for sending online invitations. Facebook events, we hardly knew ye.
dc:creator: Callie Holtermann
media:credit: Michelle Groskopf for The New York Times
media:description: Natasha Hunt Lee, right, at a party for the release of her debut EP, “The End of the World!” She invited guests using Partiful, which she called “the primary party platform right now.”
